Detailed Description

Contains implementation of methods related to position presentation ( page_6 ).

In this file important methods performing playing and unplaying move are implemented, together with interface neccessary for hashing positions. Approach to position presentation is block oriented.

Function Documentation

Hash_key get_random_Hash_key (  ) 

Function returning random number of Hash_key type.

Returns:
Returns random hash key. This function is used for filling Hash_board_manager::hash_board with random hash keys ( as defined in Zobrist hashing)
